title: Feature Request: Use "Name" as Hostname if no "Hostname" is entered
author: Chrisu02
body_snippet:
<!--- Provide a general summary of the issue in the Title above -->

## Expected Behavior
Hello Team, i would like to request an option if the "Host Name" field is empty, then the "Name" Field is used instead of it.

## Current Behavior
Currently you basicly have to enter the Computername twice, when working with Them also as "Name" and as "Hostname".

## Possible Solution
Add A Logic, (maybe Option switchable) which does use the "Name" Field as Hostname if Hostname is empty.

comments.author: simonai1254
comments.snippet:
Actually I would keep this feature request open (though with low priority), as removing a redundancy in the config file should be a good thing. 

And @TheWiever9: do you have an Idea how this behaves when you have an IP address in the connection name? I eg. need to configure both hostnames or IPs depending on where I would like to connect to - not all systems have the DNS aligned with how I need to use that...
